items.title: Enchanted Ring
items.description:
Costs BOTH points AND gold.
-15 Points, -20 Gold

layout.title: Hi There!
layout.description:
<center>Actually, this is supposed to be a demonstration of a card with an image...
But posing in silence is booooring!
 So, welcome to the Cafe! What kind of dream will you pick today? Don't be shy, come a little closer...
Wait, damn, wrong page...
Err... well... have fun anyway!
I recommend clicking the pencil icon in the bottom left to open the editor. As for the help page... eh, it's probably down there somewhere too, I haven't actually seen it myself yet...</center>
